table.mysql: CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forum_categories}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `l` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `r` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `pid` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `level` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `tree_id` int(11) unsigned default '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `l` (`l`,`r`,`pid`,`level`) ); INSERT INTO `{TABLE.forum_categories}` (`id`,`l`,`r`,`pid`,`level`,`tree_id`) VALUES ("1","1","2","0","1","1");

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forum_categories_details}` ( `node_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `lang` char(2) NOT NULL default 'de', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `description` varchar(255) default NULL, `public` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `active` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `image` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image_version` int(1) unsigned default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`node_id`,`lang`) ); INSERT INTO `{TABLE.forum_categories_details}` (`node_id`,`lang`,`title`,`description`,`public`,`active`,`image`,`image_version`) VALUES ("1","de","root",NULL,"1","1",NULL,NULL);

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forum_forums}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `category_id` int(11) unsigned default '0', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `description` varchar(255) default NULL, `topic_count` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `posting_count` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lastentry_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lastentry_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lastentry_topic` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lastentry_posting` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lastentry_posting_title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `active` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `image` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `image_version` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `category_id` (`category_id`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forum_postings}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `topic_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `l` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `r` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `pid` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `level` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `body` text, `creation_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `view_count` tinyint(3) unsigned default '0', `tree_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `active` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `tree_id` (`tree_id`), KEY `l` (`l`), KEY `r` (`r`), KEY `pid` (`pid`), KEY `level` (`level`) ); alter table `{TABLE.forum_postings}` ,add column `upload_file_id` int (11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL after `active`;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forum_postings_alerts}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `message` text, `user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`user`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forum_notification}` ( `topic_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `watchdate` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `notified` int(1) unsigned default '0', `type` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`topic_id`,`user_id`) );

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.forum_topics}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `forum_id` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `mod_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `type` tinyint(3) unsigned default '0', `view_count` int(11) unsigned default '0', `posting_count` int(11) unsigned default '0', `lastentry_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lastentry_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `active` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `forum_id` (`forum_id`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.search_assoc_forum_sys}` ( `info_id` int(14) NOT NULL default '0', `kw_id` int(14) NOT NULL default '0', `weight` smallint(4) NOT NULL default '0', KEY `spider_id` (`info_id`), KEY `key_id` (`kw_id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM

CREATE TABLE `{TABLE.search_infos_forum_sys}` ( `id` int(14) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `description` text NOT NULL, `active` int(1) NOT NULL default '1', `ext_link` varchar(255) default NULL, `content_id` int(14) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `content_type` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `image` int(11) unsigned default '0', `public` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `creation_date` int(11) default NULL, `creation_user` int(11) default NULL, `mod_user` int(11) default NULL, `valid_from` int(11) unsigned default '0', `valid_until` int(11) unsigned default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ;
